price: Yeroo Muusaaf halkan afurtama beellamne [yaadadhaa]. Ergasii isin isa boodaa jibicha [gabbaramaa] taasifattanii warra of miidhe taatan .
arabic: وَإِذۡ وَٰعَدۡنَا مُوسَىٰٓ أَرۡبَعِينَ لَيۡلَةٗ ثُمَّ ٱتَّخَذۡتُمُ ٱلۡعِجۡلَ مِنۢ بَعۡدِهِۦ وَأَنتُمۡ ظَٰلِمُونَ

version.title: Oromo translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Oromo by Ghaly Ababour Abaghuna, printed in 2009.

meta.transliteration: wa-idh wāʿadnā mūsā arbaʿīna laylatan thumma ittakhadhtumu al-ʿij'la min baʿdihi wa-antum ẓālimūna
